title: Convenient Location, Carpeting/Vinyl, Frost-Free Refrigerator
posting_body: ['Cherry Ridge Apartments in Aurora , CO', 'Come see why we are so popular!', 'Our spacious, well designed apartment homes have all electric kitchens stove, refrigerators, dishwashers, disposals, All homes have wall to wall carpet, window coverings and lots of closet space.', 'Select units have balconies and air conditioning units!', 'Our community features a huge heated indoor pool , sparkilng outdoor pool, Play ground, fitness Center and a great central Aurora location!', 'We also have laundry facilities, internet cafe and lots of off street parking.', 'Cherry Ridge is also located in the Cherry Creek school district.', 'Visit us today and find out why Cherry Ridge is a very special place to live!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Vanity', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Window Coverings', '- Large Bedrooms', '- Electric Stove', '- Carpeting/Vinyl', '- Private Balconies/Patios(select units)', '- Frost-Free Refrigerator', '- Walk', 'In closets', '- Pets Welcome', '- Dishwasher', '- Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities', '- Controlled Access Entry Building', '- 2 Sparkling Heated Swimming Pool', '- Easy Freeway Access', '- Convenient Location', '- Laundry Facility', '- Close to RTD-stops & park and light rail', '- Zumba classes on property', '- Fitness Center', '- Package Acceptance At The Office', '- Near Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '- 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets 60 lbs or less combined)', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times more the rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 9-5 Saturday 10-4', 'Cherry Ridge', '919 South Peoria Street, Aurora, CO, 80012', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'A6U9WhdXarR']
